item.title: Open bank from item help plz
item.dc:creator: @eekz eekz
item.description:
@eekz wrote:

ok to get to work so when you click a cluescroll

note i think it only works for pimpscape

any way search

case 1917: //Beer sendMessage("You drink the beer, and feel a bit drunk!"); drunkTimer += 80; deleteItem(1917, getItemSlot(1917), 1); break;

and under that add

case (item id here): //Beer sendMessage("(what you want it to say!"); openUpBank(); break;
and your done

item.title: Open bank from item help plz
item.dc:creator: @dino1001 dino1001
item.description:
@dino1001 wrote:

ok i will tell u how i did it and give u the code
(for learning purposes)

ok i cba to show u how to use item masking

so here is simple

go to case 53: and add

if(itemUsed == *item num1* && useWith == item num2*) {
openUpBank();;
}
